profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.4 Cross reference table - Spacings after xref
profile.description: The xref keyword and the cross reference subsection header shall be separated by a single EOL marker
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The xref keyword and the cross reference subsection header shall be separated by a single EOL marker

error.message: Spacings after the 'xref' keyword iin the cross reference table do not comply PDF/A specification
